abstract: The free Podlinez service lets you dial up and listen to podcasts over the phone.
snippet: The free Podlinez service lets you dial up and listen to podcasts over the phone.
lead_paragraph: Got time to kill and minutes to burn on your mobile phone plan? The free Podlinez service lets you dial up and listen to podcasts over the phone. Visit podlinez.com to see a list of numbers to dial for shows like NPR’s hourly news summary or This Week in Tech. The numbers aren’t toll-free, though, so make sure you have free long-distance calling on your plan before diving in. J. D. BIERSDORFER

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Dial-Up Podcasts

abstract: Now that Alan D. Schwartz’s impending departure from JPMorgan Chase is confirmed, the next question that arises is this: Where will he go next?
lead_paragraph: Now that Alan D. Schwartz’s impending departure from JPMorgan Chase is confirmed, the next question that arises is this: Where will he go next?
